overview:
Since 2005, Ryan has been acting as SEO/SEM consultant for some of the leading brands in China Mainland, including China Mobile, K-Touch and Zhejiang Wanma. Faced with an increasing number of foreign companies that are eager to enter China’s digital market, Ryan founded Chinese SEO Shifu, a company that is committed to positively improving the visibility of the online presence of foreign brands for various marketing goals.

Simply speaking, Ryan is passionate about anything related to search engines and expert on search engine marketing.
